šum-ma a-wi-lum a-na DUMU.MEŠ ša ir-šu-ú aš-ša-tim i-hu-uz a-na DUMU-šu ṣe-eh-ri-im aš-ša-tam la i-hu-uz wa-ar-ka a-bu-um a-na ši-im-tim it-ta-al-ku i-nu-ma ah-hu i-zu-uz-zu i-na NÍG.GA É A.BA a-na a-hi-šu-nu ṣe-eh-ri-im ša aš-ša-tam la ah-zu e-li-a-at zi-it-ti-šu KUG.BABBAR ter-ha-tim i-ša-ak-ka-nu-šum-ma aš-ša-tam ú-ša-ah-ha-zu-šu
